layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 579x28
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 579x28
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 579x24
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 271x24 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutTable {TABLE} at (1,1) size 269x22
                LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 269x22
                  LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 269x18
                    LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 265x18 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
                      RenderText {#text} at (1,1) size 263x16
                        text run at (1,1) width 263: "Look at me contributing some minwidth."
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (275,13) size 302x2 [bgcolor=#FF0000] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
